document.full_text: jake kelly gave up a big ten career at iowa after his mother was killed in a plane crash. now he's playing in the n.c.a.a. tournament, as she had dreamed for him.
document.title: buoyed by memory of his mother, indiana state guard plays on
lines_and_colors: jake kelly gave up a big ten career at iowa after his mother was killed in a plane crash. now he's playing in the n.c.a.a. tournament, as she had dreamed for him.
